name: The Golden Beach
longDesc: Fine grain sand, the color of gold dust fills the beach at the head of the river.  Vine covered statues are placed in a semi-circle around a central statue of a figure that has itâ€™s arm outstretched as if it is pointing towards something, it is covered in vines from head-to-toe.  Beyond the clearing is a trail and a marker.
shortDesc: A beach with golden sand sits at the head of the river. Vine covered statues are visible. Beyond the clearing is a trail.
